review_title: Great place to gain skills and serve your community
job_title: Certified instructor of Basic Life Support (BLS)
pros: Flexibility You say how many students max you will teach per session
cons: Nothing really. Its great to contribute.

pros: Working and volunteering for the American Red Cross helped me in my career as well as providing me with a fulfilling experience helping people when they were in need.
cons: Working for and volunteering for the American Red Cross had no cons in my opinion.

pros: Sense of purpose, opportunities to advance
cons: High-reliance on volunteer work force and leaves employees to cover a range of gaps when volunteers are understandable not available

review_title: A great company to volunteer for.
pros: Great volunteer opportunities.  Help to build some skill sets.  Offers free classes based on volunteer hours.
cons: Some opportunities may not be available in some areas.

pros:
Leadership experience
Resume builder
Contributing to a good cause
cons:
No compensation 
No room to move to paid position
